Package Sprites

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprites.Sprite
      • Sprites.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rifle, Shotgun, SniperRifle
    public class Weapon
extends Sprite
    Author:
    kennywu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Weapon​(int x, int y, int width, int height, int maxDelay, java.lang.String fileName, Bullet bullet, processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Creates and initializes the weapon with a image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw​(processing.core.PApplet drawer, double angle)
      Draws the weapon and updates some additional info for weapon, such as the firing delay and the new weapon angle
      Bullet fire()
      Initializes and creates a new bullet with stats according to the bullet field If the time after the last bullet has been created is less than the allocated delay time then a bullet will not be created.
      double getAngle()
      returns the angle of weapon
      Bullet getBullet()
      returns the bullet object in case stats want to be changed
      int getCurrDelay()
      Returns the current delay between each time a new bullet is created
      void resetDelay()
      After bullets are fired call method to set the delay between next shot
      void setDelay​(int delay)
      Sets new delay between each time a new bullet is created

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon​(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              int maxDelay,
              java.lang.String fileName,
              Bullet bullet,
              processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Creates and initializes the weapon with a image. Creates a bullet object for image storage and weapon stats purposes
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate of weapon
        y - center y coordinate of weapon
        width - width of weapon
        height - height of weapon
        drawer - PApplet drawer to initialize weapon image

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 double angle)
        Draws the weapon and updates some additional info for weapon, such as the firing delay and the new weapon angle
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet drawer
        angle - the angle of the weapon in radians

      • fire

        public Bullet fire()
        Initializes and creates a new bullet with stats according to the bullet field If the time after the last bullet has been created is less than the allocated delay time then a bullet will not be created.
        Returns:
        new Bullet object if delay <= 0, else return null

      • resetDelay

        public void resetDelay()
        After bullets are fired call method to set the delay between next shot

      • getBullet

        public Bullet getBullet()
        returns the bullet object in case stats want to be changed
        Returns:
        the bullet object held in field

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        returns the angle of weapon
        Returns:
        Angle of the weapon

      • getCurrDelay

        public int getCurrDelay()
        Returns the current delay between each time a new bullet is created
        Returns:
        current delay between each time a new bullet is created

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay​(int delay)
        Sets new delay between each time a new bullet is created
        Parameters:
        delay - the new delay time
